description:
According to New Relic’s fourth annual State of the Java Ecosystem report released today, Java remains one of the most popular languages among developers nearly three decades on due to its “scalability and portability, allowing users to run on any device with a Java virtual machine.” The report, based on data from hundreds of thousands... Read more »

The post New Relic: Developers swiftly embracing newer Java releases appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: New Relic: Developers swiftly embracing newer Java releases
